text: Mio Mao is an Italian stop-motion animated children's television series created by Francesco Misseri, which rans from 6 January 1974 (hiatus shown until 2005) to 2 March 2007 aired on Programma Nazionale in Italy and Milkshake! in the United Kingdom (serieses 2â€•3). The programme aimed at babies and toddlers, it showed features the red kitten named Mio and a white kitten named Mao, they discover to reflect the objects and solutions. title: Mio Mao
